    Package Description
    se.swedenconnect.signservice.engine
    SignService engine logic.

    • Uses of EngineContext in se.swedenconnect.signservice.engine

      Methods in se.swedenconnect.signservice.engine that return EngineContext 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      protected EngineContext DefaultSignServiceEngine.setupContext​(SignServiceContext signServiceContext)
      Given a SignServiceContext the method sets up an EngineContext.
      Methods in se.swedenconnect.signservice.engine with parameters of type EngineContext 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      protected void DefaultSignServiceEngine.completeAuthentication​(HttpUserRequest httpRequest, AuthenticationResult authnResult, EngineContext context)
      The "complete authentication" method is invoked after the authentication handler has reported a successful user authentication.
      protected SignServiceProcessingResult DefaultSignServiceEngine.createErrorResponse​(HttpUserRequest httpRequest, EngineContext context, SignServiceError error)
      Method that is invoked to create an error response message that is to be sent back to the client.
      protected SignRequestMessage DefaultSignServiceEngine.decodeMessage​(HttpUserRequest httpRequest, EngineContext context)
      Decodes a sign request message.
      protected SignServiceProcessingResult DefaultSignServiceEngine.finalizeSignRequest​(HttpUserRequest httpRequest, AuthenticationResult authnResult, EngineContext context)
      The finalize step is invoked after the user authentication is finished and the method proceeds to complete the signature operation.
      protected AuthenticationResultChoice DefaultSignServiceEngine.initAuthentication​(HttpUserRequest httpRequest, SignRequestMessage signRequest, EngineContext context)
      Initializes the user authentication phase.
      protected SignServiceProcessingResult DefaultSignServiceEngine.processSignRequest​(HttpUserRequest httpRequest, EngineContext context)
      Initializes the processing of a sign request message.
      protected SignServiceProcessingResult DefaultSignServiceEngine.resumeAuthentication​(HttpUserRequest httpRequest, EngineContext context)
      Is called when the engine is invoked after the user has been directed to the authentication service.
      void DefaultSignRequestMessageVerifier.verifyMessage​(SignRequestMessage signRequestMessage, EngineConfiguration configuration, EngineContext context)
      Verifies a SignRequestMessage.
      void SignRequestMessageVerifier.verifyMessage​(SignRequestMessage signRequestMessage, EngineConfiguration configuration, EngineContext context)
      Verifies a SignRequestMessage.
